channel.title: Posts on Fagerholm
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Fagerholm

item.title: Technologies
item.description: These are the technologies I master. Some of these I have not touched in the last year. I first touched C and C++ back in 2014. It was my main language until 2016, then I started learning Java and Python through the University. I have later used C# in a few projects, in both website heavy projects and an embedded project. In the recent years I have mainly done Web development with Javascript, React, Vue and Angular.

item.title: Init post
item.description: This is the fist post on my blog As of 2021 I will try to output some content. This is the very first post. Some ideas what to do in 2021 Deploy my own portfolio website (This site) Learn more about technologies I already handle Learn more about new technologies Submit to at least two open source projects Finish my Master’s degree
